channel.title: How To Start An Argument Online
channel.description: How to start an argument online: 1. State your opinion 2. Wait....

item.title: How To Start An Argument Online
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

how to start an argument online

  1. be a mod
  2. tell other people they are wrong
  3. delete all posts that disagree with you

Read full topic
item.source: How To Start An Argument Online

item.title: How To Start An Argument Online
item.dc:creator: @antiyou antiyou
item.description:
@antiyou wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:16, topic:543280”][quote author=antiyou link=topic=662156.msg4425925#msg4425925 date=1400812943]
Pure_ is a little piece of shit bitch that deserves to get killed.
[/quote]I don’t give a **** who you are or where you live. You can count on me to be there to bring your ****ing life to a hellish end. I’ll put you in so much ****ing pain that it’ll make Jesus being nailed to a cross in the desert look like a ****ing back massage on a tropical island. I don’t give a **** how many reps you have or how tough you are IRL, how well you can fight, or how many ****ing guns you own to protect yourself. I’ll ****ing show up at your house when you aren’t home. I’ll turn all the lights on in your house, leave all the water running, open your fridge door and not close it, and turn your gas stove burners on and let them waste gas. You’re going to start stressing the **** out, your blood pressure will triple, and you’ll have a ****ing heart attack. You’ll go to the hospital for a heart operation, and the last thing you’ll see when you’re being put under in the operating room is me hovering above you, dressed like a doctor. When you wake up after being operated on, wondering what ticking time bomb is in your chest waiting to go off. You’ll recover fully from your heart surgery. And when you walk out the front door of the hospital to go home I’ll run you over with my ****ing car out of no where and kill you. I just want you to know how easily I could ****ing destroy your pathetic excuse of a life, but how I’d rather go to a great ****ing length to make sure your last remaining days are spent in a living, breathing ****ing hell. It’s too late to save yourself, but don’t bother committing suicide either… I’ll ****ing resuscitate you and kill you again myself you bitch-faced phaggot. Welcome to hell, population: you[/quote]

I’ll cut your fucking beard off.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Start An Argument Online

item.title: How To Start An Argument Online
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“antiyou, post:15, topic:543280”]Pure_ is a little piece of shit bitch that deserves to get killed.[/quote]I don’t give a **** who you are or where you live. You can count on me to be there to bring your ****ing life to a hellish end. I’ll put you in so much ****ing pain that it’ll make Jesus being nailed to a cross in the desert look like a ****ing back massage on a tropical island. I don’t give a **** how many reps you have or how tough you are IRL, how well you can fight, or how many ****ing guns you own to protect yourself. I’ll ****ing show up at your house when you aren’t home. I’ll turn all the lights on in your house, leave all the water running, open your fridge door and not close it, and turn your gas stove burners on and let them waste gas. You’re going to start stressing the **** out, your blood pressure will triple, and you’ll have a ****ing heart attack. You’ll go to the hospital for a heart operation, and the last thing you’ll see when you’re being put under in the operating room is me hovering above you, dressed like a doctor. When you wake up after being operated on, wondering what ticking time bomb is in your chest waiting to go off. You’ll recover fully from your heart surgery. And when you walk out the front door of the hospital to go home I’ll run you over with my ****ing car out of no where and kill you. I just want you to know how easily I could ****ing destroy your pathetic excuse of a life, but how I’d rather go to a great ****ing length to make sure your last remaining days are spent in a living, breathing ****ing hell. It’s too late to save yourself, but don’t bother committing suicide either… I’ll ****ing resuscitate you and kill you again myself you bitch-faced phaggot. Welcome to hell, population: you

Read full topic

item.title: How To Start An Argument Online
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Here are some of my populist opinions that have proven very controversial in the past:

  • Rape is bad
  • Abortion should be a choice
  • People are innocent until proven guilty
  • Nobody is born smart
  • Programming is hard
  • Net neutrality is good
  • Evolution is a well backed-up scientific theory
  • God is probably not real
  • Cannabis is bad for you
  • Drug education over drug legislation

Read full topic
item.source: How To Start An Argument Online
